actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 93-1358.
Measure laid on table in House, S. 605 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of June 30, 1944, an act "To provide for the establishment of the Harpers Ferry National Monument".

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior, in his administration of the Harpers Ferry National Monument, to acquire additional lands and to provide, directly or by contract, an interpretive shuttle transportation service within and between the lands acquired for such National Monument. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out the purposes of the Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of June 30, 1944, an act "To provide for the establishment of the Harpers Ferry National Monument".
